column18: VEDANT Khud ko Prejudiced keh raha hai.

column7: INZAMAM: : Pan Am ek french crew ko tayyar kar rahaa hain ## SAFIRINI: : Kitni der mein ? ## INZAMAM: : Bas kuch hi der , tab take passengers mein se kam se kam aurtien aur bache toh chhod do . ## SAFIRINI: : Tum waqt batao . Pilots jaldi aaye toh hum tumhari baat par amal karne ki sochenge ## INZAMAM: : Mai poori koshish kar rahaa hoon , airport bandh hai issiliye unhe aane mein thoda waqt lag sakta hain ## SAFIRINI: : Waqt nahi hain Inzemam . angrezi samajhne waali crew bhej jaldi . ## INZAMAM: : Tum aurtein aur bache bhejoge ? ## SAFIRINI: : Sochenge . ##
column8: Pilots jaldi aaye toh SAFIRINI aurtien aur bache chhod ne par sochega.
